column4: Vlet-> am just curious as i dont have 64bit cpu,  are you expecting an improvement using 64bit hardy?
No, it just seemed like the right thing to use on a xeon
Honestly, I think I would have been better off using 32 bit, but it would mean quite a bit of work to reconfigure this server
well, I think it's less limited than one might suspect. So far, the only problems I have had are with gd, and a program called genpuid which does audio fingerprinting
